title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 7-3.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 7-3.1 - General

State Regulations

The amount of estimated tax due as shown on a declaration
of estimated tax may be paid in installments or, at the election of the
taxpayer, may be paid in full at the time of filing the declaration. If the
estimated tax is paid in installments, one installment, following any mandatory
first installment paid must accompany the declaration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
7-3.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
